newsletter.headline: Newsletter subscription
newsletter.subscribeToNewsletterLabel: Yes, I would like to receive free newsletter regularly! (You can unsubscribe at any time.)
newsletter.unsubscribed: You have successfully unsubscribed from the newsletter.

subscribed.headline: You have just subscribed to our newsletter.
subscribed.message: To complete your registration, check your email inbox for our confirmation email and click the link contained therein.

newsletter.doubleSubscribe: If you don't receive a confirmation email within the next few minutes, you may already be subscribed to the newsletter. Check your inbox and spam folder. Then try logging in again and contact our support if that doesn't work either.
